Method Detail

idEquals

public static <ID extends Serializable,T extends Entity<ID>> T idEquals(Entity<ID> entity,
                                                                        Class<? extends T> type,
                                                                        Object obj)
Checks if an object is an instance of an entity type and its id is equals to the provided entity id.

Parameters:
entity - Entity.
type - Entity type.
obj - Object to check.
Returns:
The object casts to type if neither the object nor the entity are null, obj is an instance of type and the object and the entity have the same id (even if the id is null). Null otherwise.

idHashCode

public static int idHashCode(Entity<?> entity)
Returns the hash code of the id of the entity. If either the entity or its id are null a constant number is returned.
